scripts.buildtestmain: pulp build --main Test.Main && psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Test.Main --module Test.Main --output static/testmain.js
scripts.buildtestworker: pulp build --main Test.Worker && psc-bundle  output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Test.Worker --module Test.Worker --output static/testworker.js
